segments.text: Shall I punch out for you , Ross ? I am leaving now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thanks . I have got to work overtime .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But today is Friday . You are not going to work overtime on Friday evening , are you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I am . I'll have to finish this report for next Monday's meeting . Is Tom coming to pick you up ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . We ’ ll meet at my house . He invited my family to spend the weekend with his family at their villa .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's nice . Where is his villa ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's not his villa , but his father's . I think it's somewhere in Florida . I am not sure myself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sometimes I envy you a lot . Tom is a good guy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on . You just haven ’ t met the right person and I think that you work too much . You should learn how to entertain yourself and enjoy life .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , but I am a work maniac .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , suit yourself . I've got to run now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You too . Oh , I forgot to tell you one thing . A girl called this afternoon . She said she was your ex-girlfriend . She wanted you to call her back .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , nothing else . See you Monday .
segments.speaker: S1
